Cut the lettuce on the table into slices.

Cut the lettuce on the table into slices.

primitive_skills.annotations: Pick up the large knife with a yellow handle.
Slice up the lettuce with the knife
Open the refrigerator, put the knife on the on the second shelf of the fridge, on the left side of the shelf with the knife pointed to the right, then shut the doors.
Pick up a slice of lettuce, the first thin slice from the left.
Open the refrigerator put the lettuce slice on the top shelf directly above the knife and shut the door, wait a few seconds, open the fridge, take out the lettuce and shut the door.
Place the lettuce slice on its edge in front of the potato in the sink.

annotation: Put a chilled slice of lettuce in the sink.
